subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chauncey Billups scored 18 points, Chris Webber and Rasheed Wallace each had 15 and the Detroit Pistons defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 90-78, yesterday.
snippet: Chauncey Billups scored 18 points, Chris Webber and Rasheed Wallace each had 15 and the Detroit Pistons defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 90-78, yesterday.
